Task 2: Get Category from Path Params (i.e category=ALL) #
  category:string;
  constructor(private route:ActivatedRoute) { 
      this.route.params.subscribe(params=>{
          this.category = params["category"];
          console.log("Category:" + this.category);
      });
  }
